Package org.seasar.portlet.util

Class Summary
ActionRequestUtil This class is a utility class to use ActionRequest on Seasar2 environment.
ActionResponseUtil This class is a utility class to use ActionResponse on Seasar2 environment.
PortletConfigUtil This class is a utility class to use PortletConfig on Seasar2 environment.
PortletPreferencesUtil This class is a utility class to use PortletPreference on Seasar2 environment.
PortletRequestUtil This class is a utility class to use PortletRequest on Seasar2 environment.
PortletResourceBundleUtil This class is a utility class to use a resource bundle defined by portlet.xml on Seasar2 environment.
PortletResponseUtil This class is a utility class to use PortletResponse on Seasar2 environment.
RenderRequestUtil This class is a utility class to use RenderRequest on Seasar2 environment.
RenderResponseUtil This class is a utility class to use RenderResponse on Seasar2 environment.
